Register a new account

Register a new account

registrations_post(first_name, last_name, email, organization_name,
  username = NULL, phone = NULL, comment = NULL, mkto = NULL,
  utm_source = NULL, utm_medium = NULL, utm_campaign = NULL,
  utm_term = NULL, utm_content = NULL)

Arguments

first_name

string required. This user's first name.
last_name

string required. This user's last name.
email

string required. This user's email address.
organization_name

string required. The name of this user's organization.
username

string optional. This user's username.
phone

string optional. This user's phone.
comment

array optional. Array of comments for multi-select inputs.
mkto

string optional. The Marketo tracking cookie associated with a signup.
utm_source

string optional. The utm_source parameter for this visit.
utm_medium

string optional. The utm_medium parameter for this visit.
utm_campaign

string optional. The utm_campaign parameter for this visit.
utm_term

string optional. The utm_term parameter for this visit.
utm_content

string optional. The utm_content parameter for this visit.

Value

An empty HTTP response

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
